00025   class Fmt {
00026     friend std::ostream& operator<<(std::ostream&, const BoundFmt&);
00027

00030     enum FmtAlignment { LEFT, RIGHT, INTERNAL };

00034     explicit Fmt(uint p = 6) : prc(p), wdth(0), fil(' '), trl(false), pos(false), ali(LEFT) {
00035       fmt = ~(std::ios_base::fixed|std::ios_base::scientific);
00036     }
